summary: Comprehensive testing of SafeHaven women's safety system completed. Backend APIs working at 90.9% success rate, frontend UI and integration working at 100% success rate. System is fully functional for emergency alerts, contact management, and discrete user experience.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Very minor - authentication still works correctly

configuration_notes.status: API key empty - emails are mocked but alerts are still logged

design_assessment.status: Excellent - discrete purple/pink/lavender color scheme appropriate for sensitive use case
design_assessment.details: Professional, calming appearance that doesn't draw unwanted attention

design_assessment.status: Perfect - prominent red button that's easily accessible but not alarming
design_assessment.mobile_size: 364x64 pixels on mobile - good touch target

design_assessment.status: Excellent mobile responsiveness across all screen sizes

passed_tests: User registration with email, password, name, phone
Add trusted contacts with name, email, phone
Send emergency alerts to all contacts
